about_the_game:
--Important Notice--

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

You need to be careful about expressing a normal sex scene between a man and a woman

It includes common sexual intercourse, caressing, and erotic behavior between men and women

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18

1. Synopsis

JAE-WOO JEON, a naive freshman,

happened to step into the p&m theatre club.

Little did he know it was a club full of flirting campus queens.

Will Jae-Woo be able to safely go through his bumpy campus life?

2. Introduce your characters

* SOO-YEON KANG

- A tidy freshman girl who has potential in acting. / Freshman

* NA-RI HAN

- A stylish, leader-like senior who is currently runnig the p&m club. / Senior

* DA-YOUNG PARK

- A vice president of the p&m club who only prioritizes principle and compliance. / Junior

* GA-EUL KIM

- A mischievous bratty girl who happens to be the most innoccent and ingenuous. / Freshman

3. About this game

- A game adaptation of the 45M top record views Toptoon series(South Korea) - "Drama Queens".

- A new way of immerging oneself to the most attratctive characters outside the original plot.

- Abundant routes with 4 heroines to unlock.

detailed_description:
--Important Notice--

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

You need to be careful about expressing a normal sex scene between a man and a woman

It includes common sexual intercourse, caressing, and erotic behavior between men and women

All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18

1. Synopsis

JAE-WOO JEON, a naive freshman,

happened to step into the p&m theatre club.

Little did he know it was a club full of flirting campus queens.

Will Jae-Woo be able to safely go through his bumpy campus life?

2. Introduce your characters

* SOO-YEON KANG

- A tidy freshman girl who has potential in acting. / Freshman

* NA-RI HAN

- A stylish, leader-like senior who is currently runnig the p&m club. / Senior

* DA-YOUNG PARK

- A vice president of the p&m club who only prioritizes principle and compliance. / Junior

* GA-EUL KIM

- A mischievous bratty girl who happens to be the most innoccent and ingenuous. / Freshman

3. About this game

- A game adaptation of the 45M top record views Toptoon series(South Korea) - "Drama Queens".

- A new way of immerging oneself to the most attratctive characters outside the original plot.

- Abundant routes with 4 heroines to unlock.
name: Drama Queen Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.6 GHz +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTS 450 or higher
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 Series +
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTS 450 or higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: JAE-WOO JEON, a naive freshman, happened to step into the p&m theatre club. Little did he know it was a club full of flirting campus queens. Will Jae-Woo be able to safely go through his bumpy campus life?
